COVID-19 Crisis Management Unit

To adapt to the rapidly evolving developments regarding the outbreak of COVID-19 and its far-reaching implications, Scarinci Hollenbeck’s Crisis & Risk Management practice group has assembled a COVID-19 Strategic Response Unit.

To adapt to the rapidly evolving developments regarding the outbreak of COVID-19 and its far-reaching implications, Scarinci Hollenbeck’s Crisis & Risk Management practice group has assembled a COVID-19 Strategic Response Unit. This unit, comprised of the firm’s seasoned practice leaders, is available to provide legal counsel to clients on various matters relating to emergency planning, litigation, employment law, issues regarding real estate, and much more. 

One of the first initiatives of Scarinci Hollenbeck’s COVID-19 Strategic Response Unit was to develop a COVID-19 Preparedness Plan, which you can review here. Otherwise, you can learn more about the seasoned attorneys making up the firm’s COVID-19 Strategic Response Unit below.
